section.name: Overview
section.p: All released Apache artifacts are normally signed. This signing is different from Eclipse Plugin JAR signing. If Eclipse Plugin JARs are not signed with a recognized authority certificate, when you install the plugin, the Eclipse installer says you are installing unsigned artifacts, and needs permission to continue.
This page describes how the Eclipse plugin release process is set up for JAR signing.
